explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the combination of deep learning models with economic models for option pricing, which falls under the broader category of machine learning.
explanations.deep learning: The paper specifically mentions the use of Convolutional Neural Network and Long Short-Term Memory model (CNN-LSTM), which are deep learning techniques.
explanations.neural network: The CNN-LSTM model is a type of neural network used in the study.
explanations.convolutional neural network: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Convolutional Neural Network (CNN) as part of the hybrid model.
explanations.CNN: Abbreviation for Convolutional Neural Network, which is used in the study.
explanations.long short-term memory: The paper explicitly mentions the use of Long Short-Term Memory (LSTM) as part of the hybrid model.
explanations.LSTM: Abbreviation for Long Short-Term Memory, which is used in the study.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions the integration of the dual-hybrid model with ridge regression to improve forecasting, indicating the use of regression techniques.
